zh.title: MQTT Macchiatto - 优雅的Spring Boot MQTT封装工具

hero.subtitle: Spring Boot 下优雅的 MQTT 消息通信封装工具
hero.description: 让你的开发像一杯玛奇朵一样顺滑

fast.title: 快速集成
fast.desc: 仅需几行配置即可启动 MQTT 通信，告别繁琐的样板代码

encapsulation.title: 高度封装
encapsulation.desc: 屏蔽复杂的 API 调用，提供简洁明了的接口设计

flexible.title: 灵活扩展
flexible.desc: 支持多服务连接和手动配置，满足各种复杂场景

reconnect.title: 自动重连
reconnect.desc: 内置断线重连机制，让连接更加稳定可靠

step1.title: 添加依赖
step1.desc: 在 pom.xml 中添加 Maven 依赖

step2.title: 配置 application.yml
step2.desc: 配置 MQTT 连接信息

examples.title: 优秀代码示例
examples.listen_title: 消息监听 - 简洁优雅
examples.publish_title: 消息发布 - 功能强大
examples.advanced_title: 高级用法 - 企业级特性

support.title: 支持项目
support.desc: 如果你觉得这个项目对你有帮助，请不要吝啬点一个 ⭐ Star，这是我持续优化的最大动力！

footer.slogan: 让 MQTT 开发像一杯玛奇朵一样顺滑

en.title: MQTT Macchiatto - Elegant MQTT Wrapper for Spring Boot

hero.subtitle: Elegant MQTT message communication wrapper for Spring Boot
hero.description: Make your development as smooth as a macchiatto

fast.title: Quick Integration
fast.desc: Start MQTT communication with just a few lines of configuration, say goodbye to tedious boilerplate code

encapsulation.title: High-level Encapsulation
encapsulation.desc: Shield complex API calls and provide clean, intuitive interface design

flexible.title: Flexible Extension
flexible.desc: Support multiple service connections and manual configuration to meet various complex scenarios

reconnect.title: Auto Reconnection
reconnect.desc: Built-in disconnection reconnection mechanism for more stable and reliable connections

support.title: Support Project
support.desc: If you find this project helpful, please don't hesitate to give it a ⭐ Star, it's my greatest motivation to keep improving!

footer.slogan: Make MQTT development as smooth as a macchiatto
footer.copyright: © 2024 MQTT Macchiatto. Licensed under Apache License 2.0
